container_registry: Update all container image references to use correct GCR project ID: a-467519
Replace all :latest tags with specific version tags
Implement container image scanning in CI/CD pipeline
Use Artifact Registry instead of Container Registry for better security
python_compatibility: Run 2to3 conversion tool on affected Python files
Update all print statements to use print() function syntax
Replace deprecated modules with modern alternatives
Add Python 3.12 compatibility testing to CI pipeline
gcp_quota: Request quota increases for external IP addresses and compute resources
Use internal load balancers where possible to reduce external IP usage
Configure resource limits to prevent quota overruns
autoscaling: Implement Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA) for all critical services
Configure cluster autoscaler for node pool management
Add resource requests and limits to all container specifications
Set up custom metrics for enterprise workload autoscaling
enterprise_integration: Complete all Fortune 500 partner API implementations
Implement quantum-secured authentication for enterprise endpoints
Add comprehensive error handling and logging
Set up enterprise payment processing with Stripe integration
